title: S01 WatchFace for Moto 360
summary: Interactive WatchFace Time/Forecast/Fit/WorldClock for Moto 360/Moto 360 2nd gen

descriptionHTML:
Interactive Watch Face for Moto 360 / Moto360 2nd gen.
You can get the 5 nicest faces on S01 Watch Face.

This is an Interactive Watch Face
- Interactive Watch Face supported you can change the mode by tapping the watch screen.

Features 5 Mode
1:Time mode
2:Weather and Weather Forecast mode
3:Fitness and Health mode
4:Speed and Altitude mode
5:Multi Timezone World Clock mode

How to switch modes
Tap the lower right to go forward
Tap the lower left to go backward

Mode details

Mode 1:'Time mode' mainly shows time like
- Time
- Day of Week
- Date
- Year
- Week Number
- Wear Battery Level (in '%')
- Phone Battery Level(in '%')
- Solar Event Graph
- Weather
- Temperaure(in "°C","°F")
- Wind Speed( in "MPH","m/s","km/h","knots")
- Humidity (in "%")

Mode 2:'Weather and Weather Forecast mode' mainly shows weather forecast and celestial events like
- Weather Forecast (choose in "3Hourly Forecast","Weekly Forecast")
- Current Weather
- Current Temperaure(in "°C","°F")
- Current Wind Speed (in "MPH","m/s","km/h","knots")
- Current Wind Direction (Name for 16-Direction)
- Current Humidity(in "%")
- Current Barometer (in "inchHg","hPa")
- Solar Event Graph
- Sunrise Time
- Sunset Time
- Count Down to Sunrise/Sunset
- Moon Age
- Moon Phase Graph


Mode 3:'Fitness and Health mode' mainly shows fitness data like
- Heart Rate(in "BPM")
- Today's walking steps
- Today's walking time
- Today's calorie consumption(approx.)
- Yesterday's walking steps
- Yesterday's walking time
- Weather
- Temperaure(in "°C","°F")
- Time

Mode 4:'Speed and Altitude mode' mainly shows GPS-derived Speed/Altitude like
- Moving Speed (in "MPH","m/s","km/h","knots")
- Altitude (in "ft","m")
- Day of Week
- Date
- Wear Battery Level (in '%')
- Phone Battery Level(in '%')
- Solar Event Graph
- Moon Phase Graph

Mode 5:'Multi Timezone World Clock mode' mainly shows 3xTimezone like
- Week Number
- Year
- Wear Battery Level (in '%')
- Phone Battery Level(in '%')
- Name of the Specified Timezone
- Day of Week of the Specified Timezone
- Date of the Specified Timezone
- Time of the Specified Timezone
- Time difference between UTC of the Specified Timezone
- Time difference between LOCAL time of the Specified Timezone


For Android 6.0(and higher) phone users
Need to do following setup procedure after installation.
http://androidwearface.com/for_android6_users/


Installation
It will be installed on your watch automatically from your phone paired with your watch after a short time and please wait.
After installation,you can choose the watch face from the setting menu.
Or just long tap on the current watch face screen,so watch face selector screen will open.

Weather Feature
Option to set your location
- Automatically set your location by using location provider.(Low battery consumption)
- You can set your location manually.(No battery consumption)

Keep your phone's connection to wear to display weather.

Needs PERMISSIONS
It needs following permissions.
- INTERNET (Download weather information)
- FINE_LOCATION (Specify your location automatically)

More watch faces
- Visit our exclusive watchface collection for Android Wear on the Play Store
http://goo.gl/aEm45T

Please Note
* WATCHFACE MAKES NO GUARANTEE OF VALIDITY OF WEATHER.
* Please note that technical specifications are subject to change without notice.

* Tap the watchface icon on your PHONE to setup.
Please note

- If you don't like this model please cancel your order in 15 minutes. And try another watch face.


This watchface is designed for Round-faced Android Wear Watch.

Legal Disclaimer:
It is an unofficial watchface for Moto 360/Moto 360 2nd generation
Tested with Moto 360

*Smartphone and Android Wear must be paired before you use it.

[NOTICE]
If you have a question,plsease contact our email address in English.
comments: I really like the watch face and all the features.  However, it killed my watch battery and had to switch back to my old watch face.  I'll try it again to see if it's improved...but a watch that runs out of juice after about 14 hours doesn't help me.
Nice watch face but is a energy hog
Great Watchface Love it but, the world time settings stopped working. Fix please.
Very useful app with a lot of details Very well done app.
